about_the_game:
Dragon Khan is a third-person action RPG set in the exotic world of Ithannar, where players take on the role of Botu, a hybrid of dragon and human, as he must master ancient martial arts and harness the magic that flows through the land.

Botu must explore vast wildernesses, uncover ancient ruins and temples, and face relentless enemies in fast-paced and strategic combat that combines physical prowess with magical abilities. The immersive story and emotional depth of Dragon Khan will draw players into a rich narrative, while the impactful and satisfying combat experience aims to give them the sense of power and control. With its stunning environments, fluid gameplay, and a world steeped in both mystery and danger, Dragon Khan promises a captivating adventure that is as thrilling as it is emotional.
